==Dialogue==
===Agent's Test===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(When the player defeats one of Little Rose's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow meow.
:'''Little Rose:''' "Can't underestimate you, huh?"

;(When all of Little Rose's Character Cards drop to 4 Health or lower)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow?
:'''Little Rose:''' "Can't you be just a little more gentle?"

;(When Little Rose defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow...
:'''Little Rose:''' "You should be more careful."

;(When Little Rose uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow meow.
:'''Little Rose:''' "Beware of the rose's thorns!"
{{Dialogue End}}

===Agent's Resolve===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(When the player defeats one of Little Rose's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow meow.
:'''Little Rose:''' "I'm impressed."

;(When all of Little Rose's Character Cards drop to 4 Health or lower)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow?
:'''Little Rose:''' "Never thought I'd be in this situation before..."

;(When Little Rose defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow...
:'''Little Rose:''' "Being half-hearted won't get you anywhere."

;(When Little Rose uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Little Rose:''' Meow meow.
:'''Little Rose:''' "Focus! Danger's approaching."
{{Dialogue End}}

===Electro Hypostasis's Whisper===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(When Little Rose's Electro Hypostasis's Health drops to 16 or lower)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow meow?
:'''Little Rose''': "Ooh. Such decisive action."

;(When Little Rose's Electro Hypostasis's Health drops to 8 or lower)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow...
:'''Little Rose''': "Ow, ow, you don't have to be fierce..."

;(When Little Rose defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow.
:'''Little Rose''': "Don't get distracted."

;(When Little Rose uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow meow...
:'''Little Rose''': "Sorry, but I'm about to pile the pressure on..."
{{Dialogue End}}

===Electro Hypostasis's Bellow===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(When Little Rose's Electro Hypostasis's Health drops to 24 or lower)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow meow?
:'''Little Rose''': "Huh, you're good at seeing opportunities, aren't you?"

;(When Little Rose's Electro Hypostasis's Health drops to 8 or lower)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow!
:'''Little Rose''': "Oh dear, that wasn't very good..."

;(When Little Rose defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow.
:'''Little Rose''': "A weakness revealed."

;(When Little Rose uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Little Rose''': Meow meow...
:'''Little Rose''': "There's no escape this time."
{{Dialogue End}}
